Question: What are the three letters on the bottom of the object?

Reference Answer: lg

Image path: ./sampled_GQA/448974.jpg

Original program:

```
BOX0=LOC(image=IMAGE,object='object')
IMAGE0=CROP_BELOW(image=IMAGE,box=BOX0)
ANSWER0=OCR(image=IMAGE0,box=BOX0)
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE,question="What are the three letters on the bottom of the object?")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='What are the three letters on the bottom of the object?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>lg</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>lg</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: lg
